attributes.action: Demand that you make it possible to remove any migrant who commits a crime
attributes.additional_details:
Andre Babbage Was able to stay in the uk after all of his crimes because he didn't want to go home.
Many migrants come here and commit offences,
attributes.background:
Change the law, any migrant that comes to the uk and commits any crime should be deported immediately.
Andre Babbage Is a cocaine dealer and a violent criminal but we didn't deport him, because he didn't want to go home.
Of course he didn't but it shouldn't be the criminals choice!
